Enums/HoveringPopUpIconDirection.html#/s.name: left
Enums/HoveringPopUpIconDirection.html#/s.abstract: The icon will show on the left of the title.

Enums/HoveringPopUpIconDirection.html#/s.name: right
Enums/HoveringPopUpIconDirection.html#/s.abstract: The icon will show on the right of the title.

Enums/HoveringPopUpDirection.html.name: HoveringPopUpDirection

Enums/HoveringPopUpIconDirection.html.name: HoveringPopUpIconDirection
Enums/HoveringPopUpIconDirection.html.abstract: The direction that is used to change the position of the icon used in hovering pop up.

Classes/HoveringPopUp.html#/s:13Hovering.abstract: Sets the text to show in the title when in compact mode.
